sections.heading: One switch does one thing (press and release)
sections.body: Share news about what you've been doing, such as telling your classmates what you got up to on the weekend.

sections.heading: What you'll need
sections.body:
You'll need to record the news onto a BIGMack talking switch.

Plug one of my switches into the BIGMack and position my switch so I can use it.
